committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: Joint resolution to authorize the President of the United States to designate "National Ski Week".

summary.text: Authorizes the President of the United States to designate the week beginning on the first Saturday after the first Tuesday in January of every year as "National Ski Week."

titles.title: Joint resolution to authorize the President of the United States to designate "National Ski Week".
